body.raw:
This page collects our reflections and analysis of Universal Basic Income proposals.

https://lifeitself.org/2019/09/08/andrew-yangs-universal-basic-income-proposal-ubi-does-it-add-up/
Rufus Pollock is a Founder of Open Knowledge, an award-winning international digital non-profit. Formerly a Shuttleworth Fellow, the Mead Fellow in Economics at Cambridge University.
